title: 1.4 Fetching JSON Data from an API
description: With our previous projects, we learned about fetch() and tabular data. This next project will show you how to work with JSON data from an API including how to load JSON data with fetch() and update DOM element.

timestamps.title: Welcome! What have we done so far?
Code! Show the data on the webpage!

codeExamples.title: Fetch JSON Data
codeExamples.description: Demonstration of fetching latitude and longitude of the ISS from an API.
